name: Augustine's Panacea
flavorText: The demon hunter Augustine liked to use the right projectile for every occasion. She was thrilled to discover this quiver in an ancient barrow.
flavorTextHtml: The demon hunter Augustine liked to use the right projectile for every occasion. She was thrilled to discover this quiver in an ancient barrow.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: <span class="d3-color-ffff8000"> Elemental Arrow gains an effect based on the rune:
secondary.text: Elemental Arrow gains an effect based on the rune:

secondary.textHtml: Ball Lightning now travels at 30% speed.
secondary.text: Ball Lightning now travels at 30% speed.

secondary.textHtml: Frost Arrow damage and Chilled duration increased by 200%.

secondary.textHtml: Immolation Arrow ground damage over time increased by 200%.

secondary.textHtml: Lightning Bolts damage and Stun duration increased by 200%.
